name: SonarQubeScannerMsBuildBegin
friendlyName: SonarQube  Scanner for MSBuild - Begin Analysis (new)
description: Prepare the SonarQube analysis of your solution
author: sonarsource

inputs.name: projectKey
inputs.label: Project Key
inputs.helpMarkDown: The SonarQube project unique key, i.e. sonar.projectKey

inputs.name: projectName
inputs.label: Project Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The SonarQube project name, i.e. sonar.projectName

inputs.name: projectVersion
inputs.label: Project Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: The SonarQube project version, i.e. sonar.projectVersion

inputs.name: cmdLineArgs
inputs.label: Additional Settings
inputs.helpMarkDown: Space separated settings using the format: /d:propertyName=propertyValue. Normal command line escaping rules apply. For more details on the settings please view the [SonarQube docs](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=624390).

inputs.name: configFile
inputs.label: Settings File
inputs.helpMarkDown: You can also specify settings via a configuration file. A template is available [here](https://github.com/SonarSource-VisualStudio/sonar-scanner-msbuild/blob/master/SonarQube.Bootstrapper/SonarQube.Analysis.xml)

inputs.name: includeFullReport
inputs.label: Include full analysis report in the build summary
inputs.helpMarkDown: This option will delay the build until the SonarQube analysis is completed.

inputs.name: breakBuild
inputs.label: Fail the build on quality gate failure
inputs.helpMarkDown: This option will delay the build until SonarQube analysis is completed. [More information](http://redirect.sonarsource.com/doc/install-configure-scanner-tfs-ts.html)
